duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct the creation of user-centered experiences for our digital touchpoints, including online, mobile, tablet, and in-store solutions.
Mentor and coordinate the work of Designers, providing strategic direction for the end-to-end consumer experience.
Establish standards and processes for the Design Team, providing ongoing optimization of team processes to drive efficiencies.
Conduct discovery and research activities to inform the design approach, create prototypes, and partner with Product and Development partners for successful delivery.
Manage work from problem statement to concept to low to high fidelity, and execute in-store applications, while staying up to date with the latest trends and best practices.
Ensure transparency in timing, reviews, and tickets, and provide support for team members' professional development.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience (Master's preferred)
